column3: â€œI love this strain in RSO form (also called Akorn). It relieved a lot of pain, and helped with abdominal pain and inflammation caused by my crohn's disease. It seemed to take care of my inflammatory arthritis as well. It gives me a fuzzy" feeling that makes the pain go away.â€"
